original_text: And it came to pass, that when he had commanded the man clothed with linen, saying, Take fire from between the wheels, from between the cherubims; then he went in, and stood beside the wheels.
korean_text: 하나님이 가는 베 옷을 입은 자에게 명령하시기를 바퀴 사이 곧 그룹들 사이에서 불을 가져 가라 하셨으므로 그가 들어가 바퀴 옆에 서매

sentences.original_text: that when he had commanded the man clothed with linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아마 입은 사람에게 명령했을 때

sentences.original_text: saying, Take fire from between the wheels
